acceptedAnswer.text: The Lagotto Romagnolo is an Italian water dog breed originally used for truffle hunting. They are known for their hypoallergenic curly coat, high intelligence, excellent trainability, and family-friendly temperament. They are non-shedding dogs perfect for families with allergies.

mainEntity.name: Are Lagotto Romagnolo dogs good family pets?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! Lagotto Romagnolo dogs make excellent family pets. They are loyal, affectionate, intelligent, and great with children. Their hypoallergenic coat makes them ideal for families with allergies, and they are active, playful companions.
